sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Play, Users, Star, Clock, Globe, BookOpen, Code, Smartphone, TrendingUp, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, Calendar, Video, MessageCircle, Database, Server, Target, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import ContactForm from '../components/ContactForm'; import image from './image.png'; const Home = () => { const [isFormOpen, setIsFormOpen] = useState(false); const features = [ { icon:
